Normality assumption
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For a visual check, we can do QQ plots.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Q-Q_plot
It seems quite easy to do it in R, especially with the qqnorm function.
http://www.duclert.org/Aide-memoire-R/Statistiques/Q-Q-plot.php

If we want to check with a test, we can use the Shapiro-Wilk test.
http://www.duclert.org/Aide-memoire-R/Statistiques/Tests-de-Shapiro-Wilk.php
